{{Description|These special chests have been planted in various areas by the [[Adventurers' Guild]]. The materials used to make these luxurious objects is a mystery, and it is said that they can even store the spiritual energies of the heavens and the earth permanently. The objects whithin these chests, regardless of quality, will always make for a pleasant surprise.|Map description}}
'''Mystmoon Chests''' are special [[chests]] found during the [[Moonlight Merriment]] [[Event]].

Once daily, [[Linyang]] can be asked to mark a number of chests on the [[Minimap]], which will be indicated with a chest icon. Several of them may contain a [[Moonchase Charm]] and be marked by a Moonchase Charm icon instead. The locations for all the chests are available in the [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=272 Teyvat Interactive Map].

Each Mystmoon Chest opened will provide a different percentage exploration for each [[Moonlight Seeker]] stage.
* 40 chests in [[Moonlight Merriment/Moonlight Seeker#Path of Stalwart Stone|Path of Stalwart Stone]] (Liyue): 1% each
* 30 chests in [[Moonlight Merriment/Moonlight Seeker#Path of Gentle Breezes|Path of Gentle Breezes]] (Mondstadt): ~1.43% each
* 30 chests in [[Moonlight Merriment/Moonlight Seeker#Path of Austere Frost|Path of Austere Frost]] (Dragonspine): ~1.43% each

==Rewards==
Each Mystmoon Chest contains:
*5 {{Icon/Primogem|20}} [[Primogem]]s
*2500, 5000 or 7500 {{Icon/Mora|15}} [[Mora]]
*3 items picked randomly from the following categories:
**{{Item|Mystic Enhancement Ore|20|x=3-4}}
**{{Item|Hero's Wit|20|x=1-2}}
**3{{Star}} Mondstadt and Liyue [[Talent Level-Up Materials]] ×1 ("Guide to..." Talent Books)
**1{{Star}} to 4{{Star}} [[Artifact]] ×1 (Limited to sets that can be obtained from Chests and [[Elite Enemies]])
**1{{Star}} or 2{{Star}} [[Weapon]] ×1

==Notes==
*[[Treasure Compass]]es are not able to locate Mystmoon Chests.
